segments.text: Room service . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is room 1019 . I would like to order breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One orange juice , scrambled eggs with bacon , toast and coffee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will take about 20 minutes , sir . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Oh , by the way , could you also bring me today's paper ?
segments.speaker: S2
